comment: Worst app ever! Shady practices to milk you for every dime, nothing is free, even after you subscribe. Fake matches and messages to keep you coming back. Avoid at all costs, or at the very least keep your wallet closed because paying doesn't improve this piece of garbage!

I'm an attractive person looking for an attractive person but for some reason the only men on this site look like my uncles- none of which I would ever consider dating. this is a horrible app. please give me my 1 month subscription money back, thanks.

author: Ali
comment: Free message and chat even you get liked prohibited! lol, sorry but it's ridiculous. This app is not bad but just want to pay for almost everything! Just makes crazy if you are not planning to pay for.

author: Cat Thomas
comment: I like the most of the format. The color scheme is nice. Problem is that the Block/Report feature is buggy. Sometimes it works, most times I need to close the app, open it back up, and I only have 3-5 blocks available until the function fails again. And I don't like having Views dropped off because of a time limit.

author: Kevin B
comment: Constantly shoves ads at you, even video ads that play sound and you can't skip.  Carousel is TERRIBLE. Get ready to never see even a moderately attractive person within a decent age range after passing on 100 people.  Constant nagging to pay.  Pay for what - this?!?!

Just seems like the site could do a better  job of getting  read of old unused  profiles and telling  you how long a user hasn't  been online  as to not waste  your  time sending  a message  to an inactive user
Tells you you have a bunch of mail but won't let you see it till you pay. Then turns out its just forward can messages from anyone you wink at. After you pay you get nothing unless its spambots

author: akoh blaise
comment: good for matching but not good when it comes to comparing with other apps.other apps allow you to chat with your match for free .but here it not the case.and you cant do anythinh until you pay thier subs fee.basically,i will grade this app 3/5

author: Richard Millington
comment: You need to subscribe to communicate. You wouldn't opt for this when there's free dating apps that allow you to message for free. Don't waste your time or money

author: Ashley Griffin
comment: Cancelled my subscription but they charged me anyway. I lost my job and can't afford to.spend frivolously. Supremely pissed.

author: Lola Lola
comment: Worst dating app. Don't even waste your money and your time.

Tells you people have viewed yr profile when they haven't...distance limitations are ignored...same people  repeated constantly...swiping left, without looking at profiles is considered you viewing them...they try to make people feel there is a lot of interest in them and keep you onsite. Very unethical

author: juan fezile james
comment: Just the fact that you have to subscribe in order to communicate with other users makes this app unpleasant and weak.

author: Victor Ramirez
comment: This is so absurd, that they constantly send you their automated emails claiming that someone views your profile.  So stupid what they do,  you can't even view someone's profile whom they claimed viewed you

author: jason stolsek
comment: Complete scam site that wants to charge for everything. Most of the profile pics are fake and you see the same ones for months on end. I've never paid because I know they're thieves.

author: Tyler Barrett
comment: Have to pay to send messages just another rip off we are all forever alone
worst app evee, have to pay to message even when both people have matched.
It may offer you a lot of options, but the scams are more prevalent than real connection possibilities.

author: Jason Souma
comment: Not paying 30$ for something I can't even try out and see if i like it for a few days. Just a money sucking app. Don't download.

author: Stacy Robson
comment: Don't like the fact that if your logged in there is no alert telling you that you have a message also I don't understand what your paying for other free apps work better

author: grace palomo
comment: I don't like it, I thought you were able to talk to someone for free but I have pay to talk to someone, really?!

author: Andrew Camacho
comment: you can't do anything except browse profiles, anything else requires payment - waste of time.

author: Andy Goff
comment: It should be easier to stop seeing someones profile. Distance should be maintained thought out the profile. Dead accounts need to be removed. Money grabber app with the coins.

author: Sean Daniel
comment: Massive predatory paywall to the point of making it unusable

author: Canyon Smith
comment: Not actually a free app if you can't even message or see messages 🤔

author: Adam Cloete
comment: Absolute waste of money save it to meet someone out some where
It's hard to send messages when I hit the send

author: Marc saenz
comment: Not free cant even send messages to people without paying its bs

author: Lee Jay
comment: App just updated and screen goes blank white and having to reboot each time to view anything, please fix!!!!!!!
U guys charge alot and u don't even get a date

author: Ronald Guerra
comment: A lot are fake saying here but out o country
Should be able to send a few free messages.

author: Rhonda Northcutt
comment: I am having so much fun.

author: Mauricio Limon
comment: I have 6 messes and I can't read them unless I pay..

author: BARZ Temimustyd
comment: Zoosk is the best dating app please download
Its great but need to make it easyer to use and understand for first time users like me

author: Armando Flores
comment: Can't do anything without paying 30 bucks.

author: Mark Eselby Sr
comment: Pushes members to $upgrade$ or buy $Boost$ to meet others!  ""Nothing is FREE""

author: Harish Ramchander
comment: It's a waste of time, spending time on the app
Not easy to navigate.
